## HttpErrorInterceptor class

Interceptor that is used for handling http errors with default codes 400, 405..599

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class HttpErrorInterceptor implements HttpInterceptor 
```
<b>Implements:</b> HttpInterceptor
